U1703106 and 31650110479), the Chinese Academy of Sciences “President’s International Fellowship Initiative” (Grant No. 2018VBA002S) to DE, and Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region regional coordinated innovation project (Shanghai Cooperation Organization Science and Technology Partnership Program) (No. 2017E01031).
